There’s a startup on here hyping a ‘next-gen consensus algorithm’. I’m reading up on it, but not seeing what’s so novel. 🤔 Sometimes I feel everything new is just a variant of what we have.
Someone shared a spreadsheet projecting profits if BTC hits various targets (like $100k, $250k… 🚀). Fun to look at, sure, but obviously super speculative – not exactly how real life works, haha.

Solana’s up 20% this week while most of the market is flat. Any news on why? 🤔 I’m only seeing speculation about some big partnership, but nothing solid. Still, it’s a nice pump for SOL holders!
